relatedanime.anime: Storm Rider - Wild Winds, Raging Clouds
Fengyun Jue: Storm Rider - Clash of Evils

anime.description: Created by Wing Shing Ma, this 2-minute OVA is Ma`s first attempt at producing Hong Kong anime. Although it is short, this OVA features Cloud and Wind of Wing Shing Ma`s manga series entitled "Storm Riders".
